Summary: Amber glow moving side to side smoothly.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Newcastle
There were no other sightings in Newcastle on or around January 22nd 2011
divs: sighting details*outside at 4:30ish in the morning smoking a cig. *i noticed a bright light on the horizon. it got brighter and my attention went directly back to the area and it was much closer now. *i wondered if it was mars but i also knew that mars wasn't on the area in the sky at that hour nor was it on the horizon that low being that bright. *it was so quiet there was literally no noise. it gave off a amber color below and the capsule top was a amber\white color that reflected off the outer layer of the disc. it moved up closer to me but in a zig-zag pattern that was so smooth that i knew this wasn't the behavior of any of our vehicles. *i thought it was very beautiful and just stared at it as i could see something inside just looking at me. i wasn't sure what i could do and didn't really care because i had this sense that whatever this was, it wanted me to know that i was visible and that i could see it. i didn't feel threatened and i always wish i could go back to that day, since i always think about it. *i lost sight of the object as it very smoothly moved over the hill and i ran after it but there was no sight when i got over that hill.
